theDragonkin:Whirlwind.NAME: Whirlwind
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn and when you enter this stance, draw a Card.

theDragonkin:Tempest.NAME: Tempest
DESCRIPTION: #yAttacks deal #b3 Additional damage. NL increases the effectiveness of #yOrbs by #b3 NL Channel #yLightning when you exit this stance.

theDragonkin:Conduit.NAME: Conduit
DESCRIPTION: Increases the effectiveness of #yOrbs by #b5 NL Gaiin #b1 Focus when you enter this #yStance.

theDragonkin:Zephyr.NAME: Zephyr
DESCRIPTION: Gain #b5 additional block from cards NL Channel #yFrost when you exit this stance.
